name: Skeletons Cap
description: The classic danse macabre skeleton design on 100% brushed cotton acid wash caps. Features adjustable fabric strap and structured brim. Available in acid wash black, acid wash green and acid wash denim.

name: Rat King T-shirt  - S
description: All hail the Rat King. Two sided design featuring graphic back panel of a rat king entwined with a Celtic knot, with bold black text across the chest. 100% cotton. Wash cool inside out. Hand printed.

name: Dancing Skeletons Bumbag
description: The handiest kind of bag is a bumbag. For festivals, raves or everyday, this bag has one roomy central compartment to fit all your essentials and a flat to the body zipper pocket to keep your valuables safe. Featuring the classic printed dancing skeletons design. The strap is adjustable up to approximately 43 inches / 110cm and can be worn cross body or on the waist. 2.5 litre capacity.   Available in Black and Army Green - made from recycled materials.  Also available on request in rave reflective silver.

name: Flesh To Burn T-shirt  - S
description: Inspired by the 1973 classic folk horror film The Wickerman, this hand designed and printed tee features a black wickerman design and quote from the original tagline, “flesh to touch, flesh to burn! Don’t keep the wickerman waiting!" 100% cotton tee.

description: This intricately carved bat with open wings hangs from a delicate chain. Its wingspan measures about 45mm and is made from solid recycled sterling silver. Choose a chain length between 16", 20" and 24".

description: An illustration from The discovery of witches : a study of Master Matthew Hopkin on premium pale pink hoodie. Screen printed in red by hand to order. This hoodie features a single front pocket, super soft inner and intricate red printed design on the reverse.

name: Molten Star Studs
description: A pair of hand carved silver studs in the shape of molten irregular stars. Solid silver, with silver posts and standard butterfly backs. Every individual earring is unique and pairs are matched by size rather than being identical.

name: Summerisle T-shirt  - S
description: Come. It’s time to keep your appointment with The Wicker Man. Inspired by the 1973 classic folk horror film, this hand designed and printed Summerisle Apples tee features a deep red design on a natural sand 100% cotton tee. Wash cool inside out.

description: Come. It’s time to keep your appointment with The Wicker Man. Inspired by the 1973 classic folk horror film, this hand designed and printed Summerisle Apples tee features a deep red design on a natural sand 100% cotton tee. Wash cool inside out.

name: Anatomical heart necklace - 16"
description: This small sterling silver anatomical heart is carved and finished by hand.  Cast in solid recycled silver, this tiny heart has anatomical detail and a high shine finish.  Strung on a recycled 925 silver chain in your choice of length.

name: Anatomical heart necklace - 20"
description: This small sterling silver anatomical heart is carved and finished by hand.  Cast in solid recycled silver, this tiny heart has anatomical detail and a high shine finish.  Strung on a recycled 925 silver chain in your choice of length.

name: Anatomical heart necklace - 24"
description: This small sterling silver anatomical heart is carved and finished by hand.  Cast in solid recycled silver, this tiny heart has anatomical detail and a high shine finish.  Strung on a recycled 925 silver chain in your choice of length.

name: The Dagger & Hand Necklace
description: The dagger & hand is inspired by traditional tattoo design and symbolises overcoming difficulty and suffering. Hand carved and cast in solid recycled sterling silver,  hung on a 20" twisted silver curb chain. Each item is created and finished by hand and will hand minor differences making each one unique.  Other chains available on request, contact me.

name: Bat Stud Earrings
description: These miniature hand carved bats are made from solid recycled silver. Hand finished every time, each pair is somewhat unique. Made from solid sterling silver (including ear posts and closure) with oxidised detailing.

name: Little Snake Studs
description: Individually hand carved solid silver miniature snake studs. This design is smaller than the Snake Studs. Fully silver posts and butterfly back closures. Pair will not be identical as each piece is individually carved.

name: Sensitive T-shirt  - S
description: For the ones crying to the lyrics in the pit. Sensitive metal logo hoodie. Design on chest, 100% cotton, machine wash cool inside out. Get in touch for custom colour ways.

description: For the ones crying to the lyrics in the pit. Sensitive metal logo hoodie. Design on chest, 100% cotton, machine wash cool inside out. Get in touch for custom colour ways.

name: The Open Hand Necklace
description: This hand carved open hand charm hangs from a 20" twisted curb chain. Cast in solid recycled sterling silver, this piece is created and finished by hand, making each slightly unique.  Other chains available on request, you can also request either a right or left hand- contact me.

name: The Bound Necklace
description: Inspired by The Witch Swims! design, on this hand carved charm hangs a pair of hands tied with rope in miniature. Cast in solid recycled sterling silver and hung on a 20" sterling silver twisted curb chain. Each piece is created and finished by hand, making each minutely unique.  Other chains available on request - get in touch.

name: Ring Sizer
description: This multisizer is a simple way to find your ring size. You can see how to do this here.

name: The Hand of Fortune Necklace
description: This necklace evokes the art of palm reading, often associated with witchcraft and the magical arts. Featuring a dainty silver hand, each necklace has a reclaimed stone in the centre of the palm. Hung on a 20" twisted curb chain, all metal elements in this piece are made from solid recycled sterling silver.  To choose your stone from my collection of reclaimed pieces, contact me or order and let the fates decide.

name: Little Bone Studs
description: Individually hand carved solid silver bone studs. This design is smaller than the Bones studs. Fully silver posts and butterfly back closures. Pair will not be identical.

name: The Unbound Necklace
description: The unbound necklace is the counterpart to The Bound Necklace. Inspired by The Witch Swims! design, this piece embraces a sense of liberation. The hand carved charm takes the shape of a fist holding a length of rope. Hung on a 20" twisted curb chain, the entire piece is made from recycled sterling silver. These hand created and finished pieces will all be slightly different.  Other chains available on request.

description: Small sterling silver skull necklace.  These tiny skulls are carved and finished by hand, so each is unique. Cast in solid recycled silver, it is a dainty but heavy piece, strung on a recycled 925 chain in your choice of length.
